title: Simple Ways to Get Fragments in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Join Fruit Raids.
steps.content: Join Fruit Raids. This is perhaps the easiest thing you'll need to do. If you beat the Raid within a certain time frame, you'll get fragments. If you go over the time limit, you won't complete the raid and therefore will not be rewarded Fragments. Get 300 - 1,000 fragments , but you won't get any of those if you die. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Indra and Blackbeard.
steps.content: Indra and Blackbeard. These two Raid bosses can give you up to 1,500 fragments if you deal at least 10% of the damage to them. They are one of the best alternatives for getting fragments if you don't want to participate in Fruit Raids. [2] X Research source This will get you up to 1,500 fragments .

steps.title: Farm Raid bosses like Cake Prince.
steps.content: Farm Raid bosses like Cake Prince. This is a fairly easy fight that you can repeat over and over. Defeating Cake Prince will earn you 1,000 fragments. [3] X Research source This will get you 1,000 fragments .

steps.title: Beat Sea Beasts.
steps.content: Beat Sea Beasts. Hunt down Sea Beasts for fragments. If you summon a Sea Beast, like with Tide Keeper or the Summon Sea Beast item, you will not get any rewards. Aside from Fruit Raids, this is the best way to get Fragments quickly. However, this method is heavily reliant on luck, as you will need Sea Beasts to spawn in place of Ship Raids or Terrorsharks. [4] X Research source This will get you assorted amounts of Fragments, usually between 225 and 325 .

steps.title: Defeating Ship Raids.
steps.content: Defeating Ship Raids. You have to defeat the Brigade and two Basics to get your reward, 200 fragments. This will get you 200 fragments .

steps.title: Buy Random Surprise from Death King.
steps.content: Buy Random Surprise from Death King. There's always a chance that the Random Surprise item gives you fragments! In exchange for bones, you can purchase a Random Surprise 10 times every 2 hours. [5] X Research source You'll get a varied amount of fragments this way .

steps.title: Beat the Dough King.
steps.content: Beat the Dough King. Although he's the second toughest boss in the game, defeating him will net you a whopping 2,000 fragments. He takes a while to summon, and summoning takes very specific materials, like 10 Conjured Cocoa and a God's Chalice , but the rewards could be worth the hassle. [6] X Research source This will get you 2,000 fragments .

steps.title: Defeat someone with the "YouTuber" title.
steps.content: Defeat someone with the "YouTuber" title. You have to get the bounty from them and be close in level to be able to claim the rewards. This will get you 2,500 fragments .

steps.title: Defeat Elite Pirates.
steps.content: Defeat Elite Pirates. You can kill these mobs repeatedly to farm fragments. Each mob will give you 200 fragments .

steps.title: Defeat the Training Dummy.
steps.content: Defeat the Training Dummy. You need to be on a quest for this one. Complete the quest and get 200 fragments .

steps.title: Defeat a Pirate enemy in a Pirate Raid.
steps.content: Defeat a Pirate enemy in a Pirate Raid. Even if you don't kill the boss on a pirate raid, at least you can get some fragments. [7] X Research source This will get you 100 fragments .

steps.title: Completing the Horned Man Quest.
steps.content: Completing the Horned Man Quest. By doing the quest, you can get some fragments. However, this quest can only be done once. If you have the "Rainbow Saviour" Aura color you cannot use this method. This will get you a few fragments .

steps.title: Open Fragment Chests on Mirage Island or Treasure Island.
steps.content: Open Fragment Chests on Mirage Island or Treasure Island. The chests look purple and don't always spawn. This will get you a 250-400 Fragments . There are other ways to get fragments, but these are the most efficient ways. For example, you can also purchase fragments with Roblox money from the in-game store, but it's better to farm them if you have the time.

steps.title: Buy weapons, items, character-related stuff, fighting styles, and more.
steps.content: Buy weapons, items, character-related stuff, fighting styles, and more. For example, you can purchase Kabucha, a gun, for 1,500 fragments, or a Lantern Boat for 1,500 fragments. Fighting Styles you can buy: Dragon Breath , Death Step, Sharkman Karate, Electric Claw , Dragon Talon , and Godhuman . Weapons you can buy: Kabucha and Pole (2nd Form) . Character-specific upgrades and items you can buy: Stat Reset, Race Reroll, Fruit Awakening, Race Awakening, Race Awakening upgrades, Aura Colors, Cyborg race, Crew Slots, Phoenix Chip, Dough Chip. To buy one of everything, you need 422,300 fragments. [8] X Research source
